headline.main: INDIAN NAVY RAIDS ENEMY OFF BURMA; 50 Japanese Killed and Others Captured 60 Miles Below Foes' Base at Akyab ALLIED GUERRILLAS BUSY American Planes Hit Freighter, an Important Bridge and Other Vital Targets

lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI, India, March 1 (AP) -- Fifty Japanese soldiers were killed and others captured in a light naval engagement off Ramree Island Friday night, when coastal craft of the Royal Indian Navy encountered two armed enemy launches heavily loaded with troops and ammunition, a British communique announced today.
abstract: India raids: 28 Jap planes destroyed in raid on Allied air base, Assam
